ruggedly adverb
(STRONGLY)
in a way that is strong, simple, and not delicate: Older boats are more ruggedly built compared to new ones. All the items are securely housed in a ruggedly constructed fabric case.
in a way that is attractive and strong: He was ruggedly handsome. His ruggedly athletic frame is the result of an arduous health and fitness regime.
